author: Kevin Lee
description: Don't let a dead battery torpedo a Switch marathon. Here's our picks for the best battery cases for the Nintendo Switch.
title: The Best Nintendo Switch Battery Cases to Extend Your Play Time

author: Kevin Lee
description: Here are the Nintendo Switch Accessories we know will work with the Nintendo Switch Lite.
title: The Best Nintendo Switch Lite Accessories in 2025

author: Michael Higham
description: From cases and screen protectors to controllers and chargers, here’s everything you need for your brand-new Switch 2.
title: The Best Nintendo Switch 2 Accessories Available Now

author: Eric Song
description: This power bank can fast charge a Nintendo Switch or Apple iPhone 16.
title: Save 50% Off the Anker Zolo Portable Power Bank and Extend Your Nintendo Switch 2 Playtime

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Marvel Studios will not hold its annual Saturday Hall H presentation at San Diego Comic-Con this year, although Marvel Entertainment will still have panels and events devoted to comics and games as well as a booth on the showroom floor.
title: Marvel Studios Won't Have Its Annual San Diego Comic-Con Panel This Year

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Does From the World of John Wick: Ballerina have any post- or mid-credits scenes you need to stick around for? We've got your spoiler-free answer.
title: From the World of John Wick: Ballerina Post-Credits Scene Check-In (No Spoilers)

author: Danielle Abraham
description: PlayStation's Days of Play sale is still bringing deep discounts on DualSense controllers
title: Today's Best Deals: Enjoy Big Savings on Switch 2 Accessories During Launch Day — Plus Cheap Handheld Gaming PCs, Father's Day Gifts & More

author: Erik Adams
description: Dangerous Animals brings terror and “who’s the real dangerous animal here?” questions by the bucketful, reeling in one heck of an aquatic thrill ride in the process.
title: Dangerous Animals Review

author: Eric Song
description: This is Samsung's fastest PCIe 4.0 solid state drive.
title: The Samsung 990 Pro 2TB PS5 SSD with Heatsink Drops to the Lowest Price of the Year

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Ever wanted to eat your popcorn directly out of Galactus’ head? Well, if you plan on seeing The Fantastic Four: First Steps in theaters, you’ll be able to do just that. The Galactus popcorn bucket for the upcoming MCU film has been revealed — and needless to say, it’s probably going to be a major collectors item.
title: AMC Unveils Galactus-Themed Popcorn Bucket For The Fantastic Four: First Steps — and It's Huge

author: Chris Reed
description: Everything you need to know to preorder Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles, including what's new in the game, what comes in each edition, how much it costs, release date, and more.
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - Here's What Comes in Each Edition

author: coreydemoss
title: 4 Upgraded Sega Games on the Nintendo Switch 2

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: IGN can exclusively reveal not only first look images of Prime Video's Butterfly, but we can also confirm that all six episodes of this Daniel Dae Kim-led spy-thriller series will premiere on August 13, 2025.
title: Prime Video's Daniel Dae Kim-Led Spy-Thriller Butterfly Gets a Release Date and First Look Images

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: IGN can exclusively reveal that Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights in both Orlando and Hollywood will be getting a new haunted house based on Prime Video’s Fallout series and that HHN’s Five Night’s at Freddy’s experience will be based on the movie, the latter of which will be brought to life with the help of the legendary Jim Henson’s Creature Shop, who also did the animatronics for the film.
title: Universal Studios Halloween Horror Nights 2025 to Feature the First-Ever Fallout Haunted House

author: Matt Fowler
description: With Ballerina hitting theaters, it's time to rank the John Wick movies...
title: Ranking the John Wick Movies

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has updated its list of Switch 2 compatibility issues to request that Super Smash Bros. Ultimate owners refrain from using the Mii Fighter characters, as they're currently breaking the game.
title: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Switch 2 Compatibility Issue Breaking Matches With Mii Fighters, Nintendo Politely Asks Fans to Stop Using Character Until Fix Deployed

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Wheel of Time seems dead in the water after Amazon’s cancelation of the Prime Video series following the conclusion of Season 3, and a new report that claims it’s not being shopped around to streamers. On top of that, Brandon Sanderson, who finished author Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time, had some choice words for the people making the decisions.
title: Brandon Sanderson Says The Wheel of Time Fandom 'Deserved Better' Than a Cancelation After 'The Best Season,' as Over 120,000 Fans Desperate for Season 4 Sign Petition

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: If you're going to be traveling with the Nintendo Switch 2, you're going to want a power bank to keep it charged up.
title: The Best Power Banks for Nintendo Switch 2

author: Lex Briscuso
description: If you follow the yellow brick road long enough — all the way to November of this year — you’ll find out who is playing Dorothy in the second part of the Wicked film saga, Wicked: For Good. But we do know one thing: it isn’t Taylor Swift.
title: Taylor Swift Isn't Playing Dorothy In Wicked: For Good — But Here's Who Might Be

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: The Nintendo Switch 2 is compatible with MicroSD Express cards, but what are they?
title: What Is MicroSD Express, And Why Does the Nintendo Switch 2 Require It?

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo Switch 2 is out today, and fans have been quick to praise the console's improved eShop for adding a handy new feature, and for not running like an online storefront built almost a decade ago.
title: Nintendo Fans Praise New Switch 2 eShop Feature, And Far Smoother Performance

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Pokémon Legends Z-A is now available to preorder at a couple of different retailers. Releasing on October 16, both Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 versions are available to preorder for $59.99 and $69.99, respectively.
title: Pokémon Legends Z-A Is Now Up for Preorder

author: Michael Peyton
description: IGN Live 2025 will feature tons of celebrities like Ben Starr, Alan Tudyk, Margaret Cho, and Aisha Tyler plus the casts of your favorite shows and games like Critical Role and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33.
title: Check Out the IGN Live 2025 Star-Studded Celebrity Line-up

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The first full trailer for FX’s Alien: Earth and there’s a huge amount to run through for fans of the sci-fi horror franchise, including what some fans believe is a clear Predator tease.
title: First Full Trailer for FX's Alien: Earth Reveals 5 Species of Alien, Someone Pulling the Inner Jaws Out of a Xenomorph... and Is That a Predator Tease?

author: Lex Briscuso
description: For those of us who were devastated that the powers that be would essentially just throw our guy John Kramer in the trash, you’ll be happy to know that Jigsaw himself might still be coming back. According to reports, the Saw franchise is in talks to be sold to Blumhouse after the 11th installment was quietly cancelled back in March.
title: Out of the Trap? Blumhouse in Talks To Buy Saw Franchise From Twisted Pictures

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo fans have known for some time that Switch 2 is backwards compatible with Switch 1 games. But what happens when you do the reverse and stick a Switch 2 game in a Switch 1?
title: Nintendo Fans Surprised to Find Switch 2 Edition Game Cartridges Also Work on Switch 1

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Microsoft has announced Wave 1 of the June 2025 Xbox Game Pass lineup, which includes a shadow-drop of Baldur’s Gate 1 and 2.
title: Baldur’s Gate 1 and 2 Shadow-Drop on Xbox Game Pass as Part of Impressive June 2025 Lineup That Also Includes Crash Bandicoot 4

author: Ben Williams
description: Amazon UK is selling the Pokémon TCG: Destined Rivals Elite Trainer Box for £44.99 via invite-request-only access.
title: Pokémon TCG: Destined Rivals Elite Trainer Box Available at Amazon UK via Its Invite System

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Are the words “dog” and “cat” similar enough to cause confusion? Naughty Dog owner Sony thinks they are, and has used that as the basis of an official opposition to a trademark application for 'Naughty Cat.'
title: Naughty Dog Owner Sony Files Opposition to 'Naughty Cat' Trademark Application, Says 'Dog' and 'Cat' Are 'Highly Similar'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo's $10 Switch 2 mini-game collection — the game that many fans believe should have been free — requires you own at least $95 of accessories in order to complete 100%.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, Which Everyone Thinks Should Be Free, Requires $95 of Accessories and a 4K TV for 100% Completion

author: Vikki Blake
description: Final Fantasy Tactics creator and director Yasumi Matsuno has opened up about how the game came to be, revealing he wrote the story to bring joy to those in an era "robbed of hope."
title: Final Fantasy Tactics Was Made To Rally Against Division and Inequality, Creator Says — 'The Will to Resist Is In Your Hands'

author: Vikki Blake
description: There's a new Bloodstained prequel on the way: Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement, due out in 2026.
title: Bloodstained: The Scarlet Engagement, A Prequel to Ritual of the Night, Coming in 2026

author: Chris Reed
description: LEGO has announced a new batch of seven sets based on the live-action Netflix show One Piece, including the
title: New One Piece LEGO Sets Based on the Netflix Show Are Up for Preorder

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo Switch 2 owners are opening consoles with punctured screens due to store receipts being stapled into the front of the console's box.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Screen Punctures Ruin Launch Day for Fans Due to Store Receipts Stapled Into Console's Box

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: MindsEye developer Build A Rocket Boy has called on fans to wait for the official release date before playing the game after some got their hands on a physical copy a week early and took to social media to post their impressions.
title: MindsEye Dev Calls on Fans to Wait for Official Launch After Street Date Breaks a Week Early, Confirms 'Major' Day-One Update for Physical Copies

author: Vikki Blake
description: XDefiant chief Mark Rubin has quit the industry entirely, claiming Ubisoft's doomed Call of Duty rival had "very little marketing" or "the right resources to make content."
title: XDefiant Chief Quits Industry Entirely, Claims Ubisoft's Doomed Call of Duty Rival Had 'Very Little Marketing' or 'The Right Resources to Make Content'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Flagship DC flick Superman has a confirmed runtime, and also a denial from director and DCU steward James Gunn that parent company Warner Bros. "forced" him to make the movie shorter.
title: Superman Runtime Confirmed, James Gunn Denies Claim Warner Bros ‘Forced Him to Make It Shorter’

author: Vikki Blake
description: It's 2025, and Sony has finally designed its own PlayStation fight stick for PS5 and PC.
title: Sony's All-New First-Party PlayStation Fight Stick 'Project Defiant' Goes On Sale in 2026

author: Tom Phillips
description: Epic Games boss Tim Sweeney has discussed the future of Fortnite, and the developer's continued desire to grow the game from something known as a battle royale shooter into a platform that offers experiences of numerous different genres.
title: Tim Sweeney Says Fortnite's Biggest Challenge Is Convincing People It's 'The Everything Game' and Not Just a Battle Royale

author: Tom Phillips
description: Fans of secret agent James Bond haven't taken long to decide who they think is the (not so) mysterious actor playing the role in 007 First Light.
title: James Bond Fans Think They've Worked Out Secret Identity of 007 First Light Actor

author: Tom Phillips
description: A fresh patent for a new Nintendo game controller has set tongues wagging that a Ring Fit Adventure sequel is on the way for Switch 2.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Controller Patent Points to Sequel for Million-Selling Game, Fans Believe

author: Vikki Blake
description: It's been some time since we've heard from Goichi "Suda51" Suda's Grasshopper Manufacture, but both he and the studio were back with a vengeance at last night's State of Play, showing off a bombastic trailer for upcoming "ultra violent" sci-fi adventure, Romeo Is a Dead Man.
title: Romeo Is A Dead Man Hasn't Got a Firm Release Window Because 'Every Publisher Wants to Make Sure to Steer Clear Of That One Game’s Release Date'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Bethesda has released details of The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered’s first post-launch patch, which is available today (June 5, 2025) in Steam beta form before a release across all other platforms on June 11. Check out the Update 1.1 patch notes.
title: Bethesda Finally Reveals The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered's First Patch — but Performance Improvements Will Have to Wait Until Patch 2

author: Michael Cripe
description: PlayStation Plus subscribers can look forward to playing a selection of new video games as part of its Extra and Premium catalogs during summer 2025, including classic titles from the Resident Evil and Twisted Metal series.
title: PlayStation Plus Summer 2025 Additions Include Resident Evil, Twisted Metal, Sword of the Sea, and More
